reference.title: MOTODEV Database for Devices preferences
reference.shortdesc: Contains preferences that are used when working with databases within MOTODEV Studio.

refbody.section: To access these preferences, select Preferences from the menu. Then from the list of preferences, select MOTODEV StudioMOTODEV Database.

strow.stentry: Allows you to specify the directory into which temporary databases are written. Temporary databases are created when you connect to an on-device database from the MOTODEV Database perspective's MOTODEV Database Explorer view.
